title: Create Dependency Graph Analyzer
description: Implement scripts/dependency-analyzer.py to analyze task dependency structures, detect circular dependencies, find critical paths, and suggest parallelizable tasks. Essential for optimizing task breakdown and execution order.
notes: Functions: detect_circular_dependencies(), find_critical_path(), suggest_parallelizable_tasks(), visualize_dependency_graph(). Graph algorithms using networkx. Mermaid/Graphviz output for visualization. Critical for understanding task breakdown implications.
assumptions: Real-time analysis as tasks are modified
decision_rationale: Dependency analysis prevents deadlocks and optimizes execution order. Visual representation helps understand complex task relationships.
